title: FABULI 3 Level T-House. RICH/REFIN Hwds, 1.5 Baths, AIR
neighborhood: Belmont loc tight to Cambridge line, walk to Alewife
posting_body: A No real estate fee prop.
Modest 2 months in all, at approval, to secure it.
Very PICTURESQUE AREA OFFERS 3-LEVEL TOWNHOUSE WITH RICH/REFINISHED HARDWOOD FLOORING, tons of sun, new appliances, cement patio.
Open floor plan leads to newer kitchen with: refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher, disposal; appli-s all either new or newer, also find euro-tile work, plenty of cabinet space, et al.
Very scenic background extends from balcony.
Baths are tiled over, living room is 16 feet deep, basement is 20+ feet deep and sports extra storage if necessary.
Same is unheated though private, immaculate and deep/open lower level (great as a rec area--ie, pool table or otherwise), as your 3rd floor.
Also provides separate area with laundry access, direct sliders to outside for the bikes, et al. 2 driveway parking spaces.
Meticulously kept, fresh all around space.
Ready date for August 15 to September 1 latest.
